description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Strategy, violence, and the screams of your victims come together in this insane multiplayer horror experience. No stupid camera watching. Build the teddy to escape as a human or tear people apart as the wolf. Level up to improve your human and wolf skills, then try them out on your friends. Drop in multiplayer means you never have to wait in lobbies.
